review_data.title: Just wow!
review_data.content: Loved the whole experience of it. All the pastries we tried were absolutely amazing, especially the raspberry donut!!

review_data.title: Continuing the original Sprössling tradition
review_data.content: Though taken over from the Buchmann group, Café Sprössling not only retains it’s original name, but it’s signature all-vegan line up of products from donuts, pastries, cakes, breads, and the standard Buchmann line of products will have your mouth watering for more. I ordered an...More

review_data.title: A Jewel of a place
review_data.content: We walked in and the aroma of delicious food- pastries, sandwiches and cooked food - was really tantalizing. We were met by super friendly and helpful staff. This is not just for vegans but for all who would like a healthy choice

review_data.title: One of the best places to eat plant-based food in Zürich!
review_data.content: No joking... this place has most amazing plant-based food you could dream off... from vegan rösti and mac'n'cheese to vegan donuts. Doesn't matter if you are vegan or not, you will love their food! Prices are super fair for Zurich standards and the staff is...More

review_data.title: An excellent hangout for my vegan friends
review_data.content: Sprossling is a new cafe/restaurant located at Schaffhauserplatz in the former Starbucks locale and accessed with Trams #7/11/14/15 and bus #33. Open Monday to Saturday, the place offers an exceptional variety of vegan products from breads, milk substitutes, muesli, assorted vegan burgers, sandwiches, donuts, salads,...More
